scripts.dev: pnpx concurrently "cd web-express-youtubedl && pnpm dev" "cd web-react-youtubedl && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: cd web-express-youtubedl && pnpm build && cd ../web-react-youtubedl && pnpm build
scripts.clean: cd web-express-youtubedl && pnpm clean && cd ../web-react-youtubedl && pnpm clean
